title: The Great Indian Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The menu, while meat-heavy, also includes some vegetarian suitable appetizers, sides, and main entrees. Large menu. Has a vegetarian dinner for 2 for around $30. Plenty of veg dishes and will add tofu to a dish upon request. Vegans to specify.
